attributes.action: Consider and Recomend that a Dietary and Nutritional Approach for ADHD/Hyperactivity be used as an Alternative to Drugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Hyperactive Children's Support Group was founded in 1977 to provide Help / Information and Advice to Parents, Carers and Professionals seeking to help Hyperactive/ ADHD Children. Instead of the usual prescribing of Medication which is normally case, the HACSG would like to see the role of Nutrition and Diet( Food Standard Agency Research finds Synthetic Food Colourings cause Hyperactivity) being recommended as an alternative to enable parents some choice.Most parents prefer not to give medication to their children, and do seek alternatives.
